ingredients.ingredient: 1 (7 ounce) package garlic herb cheese spread
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

cookingTips: Drain spinach thoroughly and pat dry with paper towels to prevent soggy pinwheels
Spread cheese mixture evenly before adding spinach for consistent filling distribution
Chill formed pinwheels for 15 minutes before baking to help them hold their shape
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the user on simple assembly, moisture management, and the time-saving benefit of using refrigerated dough for quick entertaining.
